General.Name: J-Long Group Limited Ordinary Shares
General.Description: J-Long Group Limited distributes reflective and non-reflective garment trims in Asia, Hong Kong, the People's Republic of China, and internationally. The company offers heat transfers, fabrics, woven labels and tapes, sewing badges, piping, zipper pullers, and drawcords. J-Long Group Limited also sells through online. The company was incorporated in 1985 and is based in Tsuen Wan, Hong Kong.
General.Address: Houston Industrial Building, Tsuen Wan, Hong Kong
